Text:
i never gave this game a fair shot, mostly because the name of it is so generic and bad. I remember it vividly though, the name stuck with me because I thought it was such a poor decision. 

project IGI would have been fine. but the "i'm going in" sounds totally off-putting and out of place.

titles aside, you made it sound good. maybe it's worth a shot.
The save system of this game sucks, other than that, it's a good enough action/stealth/espionage game.
